How about Riot stop messing up the fun unbroken champs and make new ones. Rebalancing ha!
"New" Ryze ...stupid design...change back....Xin "New" awesome stuff....sucks change back....
Teemo.....nope "new" design still sucks. Irelia.....nope change her back.  Stop messing up the current champs and work on new maps or something to do with the millions of "Blue essence" everyone is accruing and nothing to do with it. How about spending more time on fixing things like "New" maps or stuff to buy with blue essence.....OOOOPS wait that's too intuitive for you NEW gameplay. Don't say that.....oh did I mention your "New" Rune system blows too...
why "new" in quotations?
Also do you realize how long new maps take to create? or how much money they would waste reverting a rework? or (this one i may have been wrong about) teemo hasnt been changed?
I assume he's talking about the shroom updated from like 2 seasons ago. Made the shrooms ranged and bounce on top of each other, but gutted the duration and arm-time. also had changes to his passive.
It's pretty clear no matter what Riot does you're just gunna complain so I don't know why you want any changes at all. Apparently unless Riot does exactly what YOU want they suck.
logged in just to down vote this guy plays nothing but arams...
I just logged in to downvote you and upvote him, just ARAM is fine. Don't judge people's choices, league is a game for having fun.

bro you went about this the wrong way mate,and new irelia is savage af this is one of the sickest, broken, OP reworks yet, leave her the same
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

This person is living in the past too much they don't want anything to change just stuff being added. Do you know just how many champs would be forgotten if they weren't changed? I mean as is champs like Amumu are quite honestly rarely played and are mainly played when people first join league or by people who "main" the champ, and the reason being that Amumu is clunky boring with nothing new in his kit or maybe his animations are just uninteresting but when riot takes a champ an reworks them that champ not only gets a upsurge of being played but they also are more likely to be played after the whole new vibe is off because they become a lot more interesting or the end up having great animations and a genuinely fun kit. It will also take much much more time to release a new champ than to improve upon a currently lacking one, not only that but new and innovative maps take time, a lot of resources and, a lot of effort to make. These new maps will also require a lot of game optimization to make it so they run smoothly. My point is get your head out of the nostalgia cloud that is in and find enjoyment in the new thing, because only then will you actually find enjoyment in the things that riot does and in the game as a whole.
Can we get a irelia skin riven has to many{{summoner:31}}

Two things I dislike about the new Irelia, first is her 'w'. Its too easy to play around and often lacks any decent damage reduction to be of much use. Even more so when compared to other like ability (Fiora's W) it just seems like a cheap imitation. The other is her ult, specifically her ability to disable autos. In a group setting it has more use but in a 1v1 it mostly worthless unless you have a clear advantage for one simple reason. The won't move into it for the disable to take affect. Even in a group setting the duration is short enough to work with, not to mention the requirement to hit something first makes not very versatile.
Soooo are you asking for a nerf?

No, if anything she (Irelia) needs a buff in her current state, particularly for her laning phase. She's still one of the weakest top laners forcing her to either play passive or just wait for mistakes. She has outplay potential but as it stands you got to outclass your opponent to take a lead with her. Basically in a fair 1v1 she's out damaged 2:1 or 3:2 depending on the match up.

She's not exactly an early game champion. You make it seem like she's complete trash throughout a game. In which case, idk where you're coming from or what Irelia you're seeing. But the Irelia's I've seen in my game have shoved their lanes mid to late game
